treatment-md.title: Hatschekia pseudobalistesi Uyeno & Nagasawa, 2010, n. sp.
treatment-md.article-title: The copepod genus Hatschekia Poche, 1902 (Siphonostomatoida: Hatschekiidae) from triggerfishes (Pisces: Tetraodontiformes: Balistidae) from off the Ryukyu Islands, Japan, with descriptions of eleven new species
